name: EMP Song Selector Tool for Mobile DJs
author: Event Master Pro

sections.description:
WELCOME to Event Master Pro’s Song Selector for mobile DJs. We are very excited to bring you this new tool for mobile DJs or bands who want to be able to showcase their music library via their website or be able to offer customers an up to date PDF of their song list. It has never been easier to manage and maintain your song list for customers to see.

This plugin is absolutely free however there is a Pro Version for $47 which adds the extra ability for customers to log into your site and save their playlist, and also a very cool feature listen to songs from YouTube with a single click.

  1. Allows you to upload your song list from a CSV file so that your customers view for your music library-song list.
  2. Creates a beautiful looking song list with your logo at the top of every page which you can give to customers.
  3. You can select a smaller selection of your song list for the print version to save paper.
  4. Calculates song count and time duration of playlist in real time.
  5. Customers can search and select and create their own playlist, create a PDF or print out.
  6. Customers can log into your WP site and save or create multiple playlists to be updated at later time. (Pro Version Feature)
  7. Listen to any song in YouTube with one click. (Pro Version Feature)

We also have a selection of other music and event planner plugins such as the EMP Time Scheduler, Music Planner and Wedding Planner. To see it live demos or purchase the full versions visit here ( http://bit.ly/1RkNNO6 ).
Credits
Concept-Idea by Paul Anthony and bought to you by Event Master Pro
| Developer 1 Zoran C
| Developer 2 Gor Mkhitaryan (email: gormxitaryan001@mail.ru)
| Developer 3 Maurino Abrasada (fullstack@gmail.com)

Translations
English only for now

Known bugs
None at the moment.

Support

email: info@eventmasterpro.com

Hope you enjoy!
sections.installation:
1. Copy the plugin to /wp-content/plugins/
  2. Activate the plugin.
  3. Make a CSV file from the MP3s on your computer (How to: http://bit.ly/1FwaPL3)
  4. Make sure your CSV file columns in correct order before import
  5. Convert song length seconds to MM:SS on CSV before import (How to: http://bit.ly/1GC8Bhr)
  6. Upload your song list in CSV file format
  7. Insert the short code [song-selector-free]
  8. Select your ‘Print Version’ songs for the PDF print/download
sections.faq:
Contact us via WordPress.org SUPPORT with questions.

Installation Instructions

  1. Copy the plugin to /wp-content/plugins/
  2. Activate the plugin.
  3. Make a CSV file from the MP3s on your computer (How to: http://bit.ly/1FwaPL3)
  4. Make sure your CSV file columns in correct order before import
  5. Convert song length seconds to MM:SS on CSV before import (How to: http://bit.ly/1GC8Bhr)
  6. Upload your song list in CSV file format
  7. Insert the short code [song-selector-free]
  8. Select your ‘Print Version’ songs for the PDF print/download
sections.changelog:
2.1

Released on 12th June 2015 without any known issues

2.1.2

  • Updated Registration Process

2.1.3

  • Updated code to work with php 5.5

2.1.4

  • Added ability to remove songs from a loaded playlist

2.1.5

  • Improved CSS design updates
  • Fixed issue with add / removing songs
  • Fixed issue with creating PDF on all browsers

2.1.6

  • adding some functionality
    = 2.1.7=
    -Improved CSS design updates
    -Added custom height adjustment in settings
    -Added detailed instructions for CSV import & sample CSV file
    -Fixed bugs with saving and merging playlists
    -Fixed compatibility with browser & latest WordPress 4.5.2

2.2.0

  • Improved UI design
  • Fixed browser compatibility issues.
  • New responsive UI for mobile and other devices
  • Bug fixes
  • Admin UI updates.

short_description: Allows DJs to upload their song list from a CSV file so that customers can search/select songs for their party. Also creates PDF file of song list.
